page.title: 10LIFE STYLES
page.content: WHEN I COME FROM SCHOOL I MIGHT PLAY A GAME OF MARBLES. WHAT YOU HAVE TO DO IS ONE PERSON THROWS HIS MARBLE AGAINST THE WALL,THEY ALL DO THE SAME THEN WHEN YOU DO THAT THE FIRST PERSON TRIES TO HIT THE MARBLE,IF HE DOES ITS HIS. KEVIN AND I MIGHT PLAY A GAME OF UP THE LADDER, YOU HAVE SIX RED AND BLUE MEN EACH AND YOU THROW THE DICE TILL YOU GET SIX AND WHO EVER GETS IT STARTS AND IF THE PERSON GETS HALFWAY UP THE LADDER HE WILL TIP OFF BACK_ WARDS THEN YOU HAVE TO START AGAIN. MOST CHILDREN PLAY UP THE FORESTRY, SUCH GAMES AS ARMY, HIDE AND SEEK OR TAG FOOTBALL IS FAVOURITE ALSO,WITH ALL THE YOUTH OF THE VILLAGE INVOLVED. SCHOOL PLAYTIMES USUALLY INVOLVE A GAME OF BULLDOGS. YOU HAVE TO HAVE A RACE AND THE LAST ONE IS ON IT THEN THE PERSON WHO IS ON IT SAYS BULLDOGS AND WE RUN PAST THE CATCHERS.
